mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INDEX_PRODUCT (PNO, PNAME, PPRICE, PEXPLAIN, PRODUCTLEVEL, SALE, SALEPRICE) VALUES (SEQ_INDEX_PRODUCT.NEXTVAL, #{pname}, #{pprice}, #{pexplain}, #{productlevel}, #{sale}, #{saleprice})

SELECT SEQ_INDEX_PRODUCT.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO INDEX_PRODUCT_IMAGES(PIMGNO, PNO, ORIGINNAME, CHANGENAME, IMGPATH , IMGLEVEL) VALUES(SEQ_INDEX_PRODUCTIMG.NEXTVAL, #{pno}, #{originname}, #{changename}, #{imgpath}, #{imglevel})
mapper.update: UPDATE INDEX_PRODUCT SET PNAME = #{pname}, PPRICE = #{pprice}, SALE = #{sale}, SALEPRICE = #{saleprice}, PEXPLAIN = #{pexplain} WHERE PNO = #{pno}
